revised_title: A Case Study of a Stone Removed from the Bladder with Hair Grown in It
tldr: A case study is presented of a patient who had a stone removed from their bladder that contained hair. The hair was found to have grown directly from the stone, and the patient had experienced a significant amount of hair loss throughout their life. The case highlights the unusual nature of this condition and the challenges faced by medical professionals in understanding and treating such cases.
